Prompt Style: Descriptive phrases, comma-separated concepts, style references
Syntax Examples: portrait of woman, golden hour, 85mm lens --ar 2:3 --style raw --v 6.1
Strengths: Artistic interpretation, coherent compositions, beautiful aesthetics, excellent at photography styles
Limitations: Limited text rendering, no negative prompt param (use --no), Discord-only interface
Best Practices: Place important concepts first; use :: for multi-prompting (cat::2 dog::1); --style raw for photorealism; /describe for reverse prompting

Prompt Style: Natural language descriptions, paragraph form, conversational
Key Parameters: HD quality (mention in prompt), vivid style (mention in prompt), size: 1024x1024/1792x1024/1024x1792
Syntax Examples: Create an HD image of a serene mountain lake at sunrise, with mist rising from the water and pine trees reflected in the still surface. The style should be vivid and photorealistic.
Strengths: Excellent text rendering, follows complex instructions, natural language understanding, API access
Limitations: No parameters, no negative prompts, content filtering, less artistic control
Best Practices: Be descriptive but natural; mention 'HD quality' for higher detail; specify text content, font, and placement explicitly; avoid keyword lists

Prompt Style: Weighted keywords, positive/negative prompts, technical terms, LoRA references
Key Parameters: CFG scale 5-15, steps 20-50, sampler (DPM++ 2M Karras), seed, LoRA weights, embeddings
Syntax Examples: (masterpiece:1.4), (best quality:1.3), portrait of woman, soft lighting, (sharp focus:1.2), Negative: ugly, blurry, deformed
Strengths: Open source, highly customizable, LoRAs, local control, no content filter, precise control
Limitations: Requires technical knowledge, hardware requirements, can produce inconsistent results
Best Practices: Use (word:weight) for emphasis; pair positive/negative prompts; test samplers; use quality tags; CFG 7-9 for balance

Prompt Style: Natural language, style mixing, descriptive sentences
Key Parameters: --guidance 2-5, aspect ratio in prompt, style keywords
Syntax Examples: A stunning photograph of an alpine meadow in summer, captured with a professional camera, natural soft lighting, mountains in background, wildflowers in foreground, 16:9 aspect ratio
Strengths: Excellent prompt following, natural language, good at mixing styles, fast generation
Limitations: Newer platform, smaller LoRA ecosystem, fewer community resources
Best Practices: Use natural sentences; mention aspect ratio in text; lower guidance for creativity; be specific about camera/lens for photos

Prompt Style: Descriptive natural language, detailed scene descriptions
Key Parameters: Aspect ratio via text, style via description
Syntax Examples: A photorealistic image of a modern home office, 16:9 landscape format, soft natural lighting from large windows, minimalist Scandinavian design, warm wood tones
Strengths: Strong prompt following, excellent at text, Google integration, high quality
Limitations: Limited availability, API access required, content policies
Best Practices: Describe scenes fully; mention format in text; use photography terms for realism

Prompt Style: Cinematography terms, scene descriptions, motion keywords
Key Parameters: Duration, aspect ratio, camera movements in prompt
Syntax Examples: Cinematic slow-motion shot of coffee being poured into a cup, steam rising, golden morning light, shallow depth of field, camera slowly pushes in, 16:9
Strengths: Native video generation, camera movement understanding, temporal consistency
Limitations: Short clips only, limited control over timing, high compute
Best Practices: Use cinematography terms (pan, tilt, dolly); describe motion explicitly; specify duration; mention camera movements

Prompt Style: Scene description with motion, temporal keywords, style references
Syntax Examples: Aerial drone shot flying over a misty forest at dawn, slowly revealing a hidden lake, cinematic color grading, smooth continuous motion
Strengths: Good motion quality, style transfer, image-to-video, extend clips
Best Practices: Describe movement direction and speed; use 'slowly', 'smoothly' etc.; start with strong first frame

Prompt Style: Narrative paragraphs, conversational descriptions, multi-image context
Key Parameters: 32K context, aspect ratios via text, thinking mode for complex
Syntax Examples: Please create an image of a cozy reading nook in a bay window. The scene should have warm afternoon light streaming in, comfortable cushions in earth tones, a stack of leather-bound books, and a steaming cup of tea. The style should feel like a watercolor illustration with soft edges.
Strengths: Large context window (32K), multi-image input (up to 14), search grounding, thinking mode
Limitations: Google ecosystem required, content policies, less artistic styles
Best Practices: Use narrative descriptions; ALL CAPS for critical requirements; Markdown lists for rules; photography terms improve quality

Prompt Style: Technical specifications, component requirements, design system references
Key Parameters: Artifacts for code, SVG, React components
Syntax Examples: Create an SVG icon for a settings gear with 8 teeth, 24x24 viewBox, stroke-width 2, using currentColor for flexibility. Include proper accessibility attributes.
Strengths: Perfect for code, diagrams, SVGs, technical accuracy, reasoning about design
Limitations: Not image generation, limited to code/SVG/diagrams
Best Practices: Specify exact dimensions; mention accessibility; provide design system context; request semantic markup

Prompt Style: Narrative style, photography terms, hex colors for precision, multi-image reference
Key Parameters: 32K context, aspect ratios, thinking mode, up to 14 reference images
Syntax Examples: Captured with 85mm lens, soft bokeh background, natural lighting, subject: professional woman in business casual, color accent #9F2B68 magenta
Strengths: Gemini-based, massive context, hex color precision, complex prompts, multi-image input
Best Practices: ALL CAPS for critical elements; hex codes for exact colors; mention lens/camera specs; can reference multiple input images
